StoryScroll.description: At Viña OchoTierras we work with the dedication of an artisan. People and their experiences play a central role in the creation of our wines.
StoryScroll.winery_description: The winery was built below ground level, allowing gravity to be used to move the wine gently. No pumps. Preserving the exceptional condition of every drop.

Nosotros.title: Our History
Nosotros.subtitle: A limited production winery in the heart of Limarí Valley.

timeline.year_1993: The story begins when the first vines were planted on our lands, searching for the perfect terroir.
timeline.year_2005: Viña OchoTierras is born. We started making our own unique wines practically by hand, caring for every detail to achieve the maximum expression of our Valley.

valley.title: Limarí Valley
valley.description_1: Land of contrasts. Mineral soils and northern sun, caressed by the "Camanchaca".
valley.description_2: Our vines grow in a semi-desert environment. The cold fog from the Pacific moderates temperatures, allowing slow ripening that grants vibrant acidity, freshness, and marked minerality to our wines.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.quote: "We believe in minimal intervention as the path to excellence."
philosophy.harvest_desc: Every bunch is selected and harvested by hand to ensure only the best fruit reaches the winery. We do not use machinery that could damage the grapes.
philosophy.gravity_desc: We minimize the use of pumps, moving the wine gently by gravity. This preserves natural aromas and tannins structure, delivering round and elegant wines.

Bodega.title: Winery &
Bodega.subtitle: Designed to respect the fruit and the environment.

terroir.location_desc: Our property is located 30 km from the coast. This proximity to the sea allows fresh Pacific breezes to regulate extreme valley temperatures, creating an ideal microclimate.
terroir.soils_desc: Sandy loam soils, with presence of gravel and calcium carbonate. This mineral composition provides unique structure, minerality, and elegance to our wines.
terroir.quote: "Wine quality is born in the vineyard."

cellar.title: The Winery
cellar.description: The winery stands out for its architectural design built below ground level. This decision is not aesthetic, it is functional and philosophical.
cellar.gravity_desc: We use the force of gravity to move our wines, avoiding pumps that oxygenate or mistreat the wine.
cellar.temp_desc: Being underground, we maintain a stable and cool natural temperature, ideal for aging our wines.
cellar.efficiency_desc: An efficient design that reduces energy consumption and minimizes our environmental impact.

Turismo.description: Immerse yourself in Limarí Valley. Tour our vineyards, learn about our gravitational process, and taste unforgettable wines.

tour.title: Tour & Tasting
tour.description: A complete experience designed for wine lovers. We start with a walk through our vineyards to understand the Limarí terroir, followed by a tour of our gravitational winery where you will learn the secrets of our production. We finish with a guided tasting of our Icon wines.
tour.include_2: Tasting of 3 wines (Reserve and Grand Reserve Line)
tour.note: * Minimum 2 people. Reservations 24 hours in advance.
